Download Game!

[Introduction]
You play as a young kung fu master, who has to survive a ninja assault. Kill them, burn them, strike them with lightings and use slow motion attacks to get level up’s and more powerful spells.

[Controls]
left,right – move
space - attack
hold space - combo
down – front flip/grab weapon
down+back – back flip
ctrl – use power
up – change power
mouse – select skill
shift – concentrate

[About]
